name: WestNileVirusInfectionTestsForWestNileVirusIgGOrTotalAntibodyQualitative
title: West Nile Virus Infection (Tests for West Nile virus IgG or Total Antibody [Qualitative])
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of West Nile Virus IgG and total antibody (qualitative results).),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: West Nile virus IgG and total antibody

Loinc scale = ORD),(Exclusion Criteria: panel tests)
